srgcwscs.Inputs

srgcwscs.Inputs Class Reference

This class represents the basic inputs for a VRP instance, a set of nodes, edges and vehicles. More...

Detailed Description

This class represents the basic inputs for a VRP instance, a set of nodes, edges and vehicles.

Authors:
Angel A. Juan, Miquel Gilibert, Marcos Fernandez
